# Introduction





## Hello World

`println()` print to newline.


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
println("Hello, World")
#> Hello, World
```
:::



## Assign Variable


Dynamic typing 


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
my_int = 10
#> 10
typeof(my_int)
#> Int64
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
my_pi = 3.1416
#> 3.1416
typeof(my_pi)
#> Float64
```
:::

## Comment


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
# This is comment
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
#=

This 
is 
Multiline Comment

=#
```
:::


## Basic Math


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
1 + 1
#> 2
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
1 - 1
#> 0
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
2 * 3
#> 6
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
3 / 2
#> 1.5
```
:::


like R


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
10 ^ 2
#> 100
```
:::


like Python


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
5 % 2
#> 1
```
:::


## Operator

[Operators Docs](https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/mathematical-operations/)

**Boolean Operators**


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
!true
#> false
false && true
#> false
false || true
#> true
```
:::


Logical Operator ignore type


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
1 == 1.0
#> true
```
:::




## Vectorized "dot" operators


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
[1,2,3] ^ 3 
# This would Error
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
[1,2,3] .^ 3
#> 3-element Vector{Int64}:
#>   1
#>   8
#>  27
```
:::


`a .^ b` is parsed as the "dot" call `(^).(a,b)`, which performs a broadcast operation:

-   combine arrays and scalars, 
-   arrays of the same size (performing the operation elementwise)
-   even arrays of different shapes (e.g. combining row and column vectors to produce a matrix).





## Exercise

`convert()` function


::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
days = 365
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
days_float = convert(Float64, days) # Convert to Float64
#> 365.0
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
days == days_float 
#> true
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
@assert days == 365
@assert days_float == 365.0
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
convert(Int64, "1") # Error
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.julia .cell-code}
parse(Int64, "1")
#> 1
```
:::
